en: A pink cardigan made of wool.
A formal, navy blue shirt to pair with a suit.
A sleeveless, red vest designed for ease of movement.
A frilled blouse made with high-end materials.
An aqua blue shirt that keeps the wearer's neck warm.
Armor for Aigis. Fit to cover a mechanical body.
A hooded, zip-up sweatshirt well-suited for any season.
Basic dog clothes with a simple design.
A long, thick coat for staying warm even in the dead of winter.
A lightweight protector. Keeps the chest well-\nguarded.
A comfortable suit made of soft material.
A durable shirt made from bulletproof material.
A practical shirt optimized for field combat.
A traditional martial arts uniform. Permitted only to masters.
A soft overcoat that gently envelops the body.
Sturdy metal armor with some decent heft.
A remarkably versatile apron fit for anything, from cooking to combat.
A durable sash made of tiger hide. Softens the force of blows.
A bulletproof vest that is difficult to penetrate.
Armor that enables survival of a single instakill attack with 1 HP.
A robe covered in sutras. Said to confer holy power upon the wearer.
A vest that resists Fire damage for 3 turns at the start of battle.
Knickers worn by manly heroes of the past. Instills boldness.
A cloak made of special fabric. Imbued with the essence of fallen tears.
A robe fashioned with sorcery that conjures up an invisible shield.
Wards off disaster. Medium chance to counter physical attacks.
A haori patterned with rivulets of blood. Harbors an unsettling power.
Traditional men's summer clothing, but with cutting-\nedge camouflage.
A leopard-print dress shirt evoking plaintive lamentations.
Victory-vying garment that temporarily raises the wearer's critical rate.
A leather jacket that lets the wearer survive death with 1 HP once per battle.
A resplendent piece of armor adorned with beautiful decorations.
A suit made of resilient material. High chance to counter physical attacks.
A bra with several spikes attached. Raises Attack at the start of battle.
A vest woven of cloth as black as the pitiless depths.
Extremely sturdy armor said to have been made from OOPArts.
A sacred coat with an ornate rose motif.
A bulky suit that amplifies one's strength.
A holy robe blessed by a pope.
Armor that withstands attacks well. Some say it will last an eternity.
A savior's armor. Restores all HP upon death once per battle.
Armor inscribed with engravings that protect the wearer from magic.
A vest that kindles nostalgia with its 8-bit design.
A shirt for bodybuilders. The wearer becomes unfazed by temptation.
Fills the wearer with a burning passion no chill can extinguish.
A letterman jacket for baseball legends. Junpei likes to wear it.
A jacket so full of holes, anyone willing to wear it fears nothing.
A robe yellowed with age. Radiates mysterious power.
Holy armor worn by angels in battle.
A sturdy vest that holds up to all manner of destructive forces.
A cape that captures the imagination of children. Amada loves it.
Special fibers keep the wearer insulated from the cold. Perfect for Sanada.
Armor worn by the water god. Highly resistant to flames.
A heavy-duty vest made to be impenetrable.
An odd-looking robe that a wizard might wear.
Heavy armor that can withstand devastating blows.
A brilliant, blood-red cape. Gracefully leads the bull astray.
Lingerie popular among women. Restores a tiny bit of SP each turn.
Heavy armor that is difficult to mar with a blade.
A graceful scarf, always billowing in the wind. Fitting for Mitsuru.
A parka made of fire-resistant tanned leather.
